channel.title: Workflow-App on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Workflow-App on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Independence
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: As planned a few days back, I rewrote some back-end code to minimize the dependency on the workflow app and better integrate with direct desktop publishing. But for a  few isolated kinks, this should be set. This should now give me more flexibility to post from indie publishing platforms and set the stage for other enhancements.
